title: Be Your Light
alternative_title: Zuo Ni De Guang ; Zuò Nǐ De Guāng ; 做你的光
status: Zuo Ni De Guang ; Zuò Nǐ De Guāng ; 做你的光
description:
Description :
        Jin Xu, a 20 year old college graduate x Xiao Ran, a 32 year old blind broadcaster. Although they are of the same gender, the two live completely different lifestyles and happened to meet by chance. In the process of getting Along with each other, they both are impressed and drawn to each other's strengths. Jin Xu's bright aura allows Xiao Ran to feel the light he is unable to see. However, Jin Xu doesn't feel the same about Xiao Ran, who is talented and beautiful. Something unexpected happened...
